meanings.definition: The position or status of a professor.
meanings.sent1: In the university, achieving a professorates is a great honor.
meanings.sent2: The professorates at the college are highly respected.
meanings.sent3: The professorates decided to have a picnic on the campus lawn.
meanings.sent4: Her professorates shone brightly in the academic world.
meanings.sent5: The professorates' influence extended far beyond the classroom.

meanings.definition: The collective body of professors at a university.
meanings.sent1: The professorates gathered for a meeting in the lecture hall.
meanings.sent2: I saw the professorates walking together across the campus.
meanings.sent3: The professorates threw a surprise party for the dean.
meanings.sent4: The professorates were a powerhouse of knowledge and expertise.
meanings.sent5: The professorates' unity was evident in their joint research projects.
